sentences.en: A spokesman declined to elaborate on a statement released late yesterday.
sentences.cn: 发言人拒绝对昨天晚些时候发表的一份声明作出更多说明。

sentences.en: a very elaborate telecommunications network
sentences.cn: 非常精密的电信网络

sentences.en: According to the prosecution, the officers manufactured an elaborate story.
sentences.cn: 根据控方意见，官员们精心编造了事情经过。

sentences.en: Elaborate efforts were made to reconstruct what had happened.
sentences.cn: 为重现当时的情景，他们做了大量细致的工作。

sentences.en: He doesn't have to go through this elaborate display for my benefit!
sentences.cn: 他不必为了我作这么详细的展示！

sentences.en: He said he had new evidence, but refused to elaborate any further.
sentences.cn: 他声称有新证据，但拒绝进一步详细说明。

sentences.en: Her children had the best, most elaborate birthday parties in the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 她的孩子们的生日聚会在街坊四邻里是最好、最讲究的。

sentences.en: His task was to elaborate policies that would make a market economy compatible with a clean environment.
sentences.cn: 他的任务是周密地制定能够让市场经济适合于无污染的环境的政策。

sentences.en: I wondered why he had gone through the elaborate charade.
sentences.cn: 我不明白，他为什么要大费周章，装腔作势。

sentences.en: In case anyone was following me, I made an elaborate detour.
sentences.cn: 为了防止有人跟踪我，我特地绕了弯路。

sentences.en: It is an elaborate ceremony, shrouded in mystery.
sentences.cn: 仪式是精心筹划的，笼罩着一层神秘的色彩。

sentences.en: Please elaborate on your proposals a little.
sentences.cn: 请稍微详细说明你的建议.

sentences.en: pure silks embroidered with elaborate patterns
sentences.cn: 绣有精美图案的真丝衣服

sentences.en: She had prepared a very elaborate meal.
sentences.cn: 她做了一顿精美的饭菜。

sentences.en: the elaborate decoration on the carved wooden door
sentences.cn: 木雕门上精美的装饰图案

sentences.en: The heat had to be dissipated by elaborate cooling systems.
sentences.cn: 热得用复杂的冷却装置散发.

sentences.en: The problem is too elaborate.
sentences.cn: 问题太复杂.

sentences.en: There is an elaborate five - course meal.
sentences.cn: 这儿有五道菜的美餐.

sentences.en: Would you care to elaborate?
sentences.cn: 你愿意详细说明一下吗？

sentences.en: You understand the situation; I needn't elaborate any further.
sentences.cn: 你对情况是了解的, 我不必再进一步详谈了.

words.tran_cn: 苦心经营，精巧；详细阐述
精心制作的；详尽的；煞费苦心的
精心制作；详细阐述；从简单成分合成（复杂有机物）

trans.tran_cn: 复杂的；详尽的；精心制作的
trans.tran_en: having a lot of small parts or details put together in a complicated way
If you elaborate on something that has been said, you say more about it, or give more details
to give more details or new information about something

trans.tran_cn: 详细制定，详尽阐述，[生理学]加工，尽心竭力地做
trans.tran_en: If you elaborate a plan or theory, you develop it by making it more complicated and more effective
